skillTree.name: Sneaky
skillTree.description: Furtive, scheming, sly, cunning, underhand, devious, conniving, double-dealing, and sneaky - valuable traits if you wish to stay alive!

skillTree.name: Tricksy
skillTree.description: All Skaven are unprincipled and untrustworthy by their foul natures. However, this is rarely a disadvantage in the face of the enemy.

skillTree.name: Frenzied Assault
skillTree.description: Violence bordering on absolute delirium; 'berserk' doesn't even come close.

skillTree.name: Arena Boss
skillTree.description: Ghoritch has always dominated Hell Pit’s blood-soaked arenas and now oversees his successors, keeping the other monsters fresh for war.

effects.description:
Recruit rank: +1 for Monstrous Infantry and Monster units
	(all units in army)

Melee attack: +8 for Monster units
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Piston-Driven Claws
skillTree.description: Giant snipping blades driven by Warpstone-driven pistons replace the Rat Ogre claws of Ghoritch’s heavily modified host body.

skillTree.name: Norscan Fury
skillTree.description: You can take the Northman out of Chaos, but you can’t take Chaos out of the Northman.

ui_effects.description: Effect intensity increases with time spent engaged in melee.

skillTree.name: Intact Mind
skillTree.description: A Berserker has a tad more cognitive ability than a Rat Ogre – the mind of the former at least allows one to be a semi-competent quartermaster!

effects.description:
Unit experience gain per turn: +150
	(all units in army)

skillTree.name: Trusted Chieftain
skillTree.description: As it turns out, leading a Norscan clan and commanding a pack of monsters are not that different from one another.

skillTree.name: Throt’s Greatest Creation
skillTree.description: The Unclean one may be less than pleased about his masterwork’s meteoric rise, but the two share a flimsy alliance nonetheless.

target_if: Unit is a Lord or Hero

skillTree.name: Martial Mastery (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: When everything else fails, there is always studying the blade. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Defensive Dedication (Skill Dump)
skillTree.description: Wielding the shield is better than returning on it. (This skill can accept up to 20 Skill Points)

skillTree.name: Tail Weapon
skillTree.description: Whether by attachment or mutation, something nasty and spiky on your tail has got to bring no little advantage in battle.

skillTree.name: Elusive
skillTree.description: "Stay in one place, gods-damn you!"

skillTree.name: Thick-Skinned
skillTree.description: Creatures with tough hides or some kind of natural armour are tough nuts to crack - even a powerful attack may fall foul of their thick-skin.

skillTree.name: Blade Master
skillTree.description: This warrior is one with their blade; it is an extension of their will, making them a worthy foe in combat.

skillTree.name: Indomitable
skillTree.description: The iron will and indomitable presence of this leader ensures their followers remain steadfast when facing peril.

skillTree.name: Foe-Seeker
skillTree.description: From one bloodied, lifeless corpse to the next, this one is always looking for the next adversary to best.

skillTree.name: Fervour
skillTree.description: This one fights with a fervour to be both admired and despised.

skillTree.name: Scarred Veteran
skillTree.description: The scars on this storied warrior reveal a veteran of many battles, a being not easy to kill and one worthy of respect and fear.

skillTree.name: Blade Shield
skillTree.description: A blade that sings in defence will not let its wielder be penetrated.

skillTree.name: Fleet-Footed
skillTree.description: Those who are fleet of foot can reach the enemy faster.

skillTree.name: Deadly Onslaught
skillTree.description: The war is endless. The cycle of charging, clashing, and bloody hand-to-hand fighting is without end. It will never stop.

skillTree.name: Assassinate
skillTree.description: A skilled assassin is a cold-hearted killer and merciless murderer.

skillTree.name: Assault Units
skillTree.description: Lying in wait, experienced and patient, striking when the foe least expects.

effects.description: Assault Units action: Additional 3% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 8% casualties inflicted
Assault Units action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Training
skillTree.description: This champion extols discipline and fear away from the battlefield as much as on it.

effects.description: Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 20
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 35
Training action: Experience per turn is increased by an additional 50

skillTree.name: Assault Garrison
skillTree.description: "If they know I'm coming then more's the better!"

effects.description: Assault Garrison action: Additional 5% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 15% casualties inflicted
Assault Garrison action: Additional 30% casualties inflicted

skillTree.name: Spread Control
skillTree.description: The sight of this warrior, their stature, import or infamy, can have a calming effect.

effects.description: Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 1
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 2
Spread Control action: Control is modified by an additional 3

skillTree.name: Specialist
skillTree.description: An expert in their craft, this Hero knows all the mistakes that can be made and how to best avoid making them.

backgroundSkills.name: Castellan of Hell Pit
backgroundSkills.description: A unique combination of shrewd military intellect and raw brute strength has ascended Ghoritch to Clan Moulder’s most exalted military rank.
